title: The hystory of the two valyaunte brethren Valentyne and Orson, sonnes vnto the Emperour of Grece
author: Watson, Henry, fl. 1500-1518.
publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the Rose Garland by me Wyllyam Copland for Iohn Walley,
notes: A translation by Henry Watson, whose name appears on A2r, of: Valentin et Orson.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date estimated by STC.
Signatures: A B-2L⁴ 2M-2Y a b⁴ c⁶ (-c6).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
